last_episode_to_air.name: Death in Deep Water
last_episode_to_air.overview: A witness against a crime syndicate hides on a deserted island, where he meets a beautiful young woman who persuades him to murder her rich older husband.

name: Thriller
overview: Thriller is a British television series, originally broadcast in the UK from 1973 to 1976. It is an anthology series: each episode has a self-contained story and its own cast. As the title suggests, each story is a thriller of some variety, from tales of the supernatural to down-to-earth whodunits.

episodes.name: Lady Killer
episodes.overview: A shy librarian falls in love with and marries a smooth-talker, who is secretly already married and plots the death of his new wife.

episodes.name: Possession
episodes.overview: A couple moves into a sinister old country house, and the husband is taken over by strange forces.

episodes.name: Someone at the Top of the Stairs
episodes.overview: When two young women rent a room in a dark house filled with strange inhabitants, one of them is killed and the other is haunted by a mysterious man who appears at the top of the stairs.

episodes.name: An Echo of Theresa
episodes.overview: While a couple vacations in London, the husband begins to act strangely, calling his wife ""Theresa,"" and they become involved in espionage.

episodes.name: The Colour of Blood
episodes.overview: A serial killer escapes from an asylum and picks a seemingly innocent woman as his next victim, but she is not as innocent as she seems.

episodes.name: Murder in Mind
episodes.overview: A woman who has been in a car accident and has amnesia believes that she has committed murder and turns herself into the police.

episodes.name: A Place to Die
episodes.overview: A newlywed couple moves to a village, where the husband takes over the medical practice, and finds that the villagers are devil worshippers.

episodes.name: File It Under Fear
episodes.overview: When several young women have been strangled in her neighborhood, a neurotic librarian tries to catch the killer.

episodes.name: The Eyes Have It
episodes.overview: When a group of assassins takes over a school for the blind, they are overcome by the resourceful students.

episodes.name: Spell of Evil
episodes.overview: A businessman consults a marriage bureau after his wife dies, but his beautiful new wife turns out to be a witch.

episodes.name: Only a Scream Away
episodes.overview: The life of a newlywed couple is interrrupted by a strange neighbor.

episodes.name: Once the Killing Starts
episodes.overview: A college professor has an affair with a student and kills his wife, but then he receives blackmail letters from someone who claims to know what he did.

episodes.name: Kiss Me and Die
episodes.overview: A man investigates the disappearance of his brother at a country house.

episodes.name: One Deadly Owner
episodes.overview: A fashion model buys a haunted Rolls-Royce.

episodes.name: Ring Once for Death
episodes.overview: A con man posing as a butler, with the help of his girlfriend posing as a maid and a disreputable doctor, poisons his employer, a wealthy widow.

episodes.name: K Is for Killing
episodes.overview: A young playboy hires an eccentric husband and wife team of private detectives to investigate the murder of his tycoon father.

episodes.name: Sign It Death
episodes.overview: A young woman schemes to marry a wealthy businessman by becoming his secretary.

episodes.name: Who Killed Lamb
episodes.overview: A popular member of the Oxford community is killed, and nobody can think why, so a police inspector is called in from Scotland Yard, and discovers they may be more to the victim than met anyone's eye. 'Who Killed Lamb?' is a one off play from Yorkshire TV which has no connection with Thriller but was transmitted immediately after 'Sign It Death' in the second series schedule and was billed and fully networked as an episode of the classic ATV series. An American actor is featured, along with scripted Americanisms like "janitor" While it bears a similar running time [65 minutes], it uses a standalone title scene and theme music. This was quite a prestigious and well-received production at the time.

episodes.name: A Coffin for the Bride
episodes.overview: A serial killer who marries and then murders rich older women falls in love with a beautiful young woman he meets at a health resort, but he must have one more victim before he settles down with her.

episodes.name: I'm the Girl He Wants to Kill
episodes.overview: A young secretary doing work after hours is terrorized by a murderer in a deserted office building.

episodes.name: Death to Sister Mary
episodes.overview: After an actress who plays a nun in a TV series meets a strange fan, several cast members meet with fatal or near-fatal accidents.

episodes.name: In the Steps of a Dead Man
episodes.overview: The grieving parents of a recently deceased soldier are visited by a man claiming to be their son's best friend, but he is not all that he claims to be.

episodes.name: Come Out, Come Out, Wherever You Are
episodes.overview: A young woman's friend disappears from a country hotel, but no one, including the police, believes her.

episodes.name: The Next Scream You Hear
episodes.overview: A businessman claims that he's being framed for his wife's murder and hires a private detective to investigate the case.

episodes.name: Screamer
episodes.overview: After a young woman is attacked on her way to visit friends in the country, she spends time in a mental institution.  When she is released, she sees her attacker and exacts her revenge.

episodes.name: Nurse Will Make It Better
episodes.overview: A woman who is hired to care for a paraplegic girl is a devil worshipper and promises the girl that she will be able to walk again in exchange for her soul.

episodes.name: Night Is the Time for Killing
episodes.overview: A woman on a train finds a dead man, but later the body disappears and the man is seen alive.

episodes.name: Killer with Two Faces
episodes.overview: The psychopathic twin brother of an architect escapes from prison and goes on a killing spree.

episodes.name: A Killer in Every Corner
episodes.overview: A scientist invites three students to help him with his new study, which involves mind control of criminals.

episodes.name: Where the Action Is
episodes.overview: A gambler is kidnapped by a deranged tycoon who believes himself to be the greatest gambler in the world and eliminates all of his opponents.

episodes.name: If It's a Man--Hang Up
episodes.overview: A young model is terrorized by a peeping tom and obscene phone calls.

episodes.name: The Double Kill
episodes.overview: A man married to a rich woman hires a burglar to kill her but ends up being framed for the murder.

episodes.name: Won't Write Home, Mom--I'm Dead
episodes.overview: A young woman who has a psychic connection with her boyfriend looks for him in a hippie commune whose members claim that he never arrived.

episodes.name: The Crazy Kill
episodes.overview: A doctor and his wife are held hostage in their country home by an escaped convict and his sidekick, but a journalist's arrival complicates matters.

episodes.name: Good Salary--Prospects--Free Coffin
episodes.overview: A young woman investigates when her two roommates disappear after answering a newspaper ad.

episodes.name: The Next Voice You See
episodes.overview: When a jazz pianist, while playing a recital, hears the voice of the man who years before blinded him and killed his wife in a bank heist, he tries to find the man.

episodes.name: Murder Motel
episodes.overview: A young woman investigates the disappearance of her boyfriend from a strange motel.

episodes.name: Sleepwalker
episodes.overview: A woman thinks that she has witnessed a murder during a sleepwalking episode.

episodes.name: The Next Victim
episodes.overview: A woman confined to a wheelchair is terrorized by a sadistic killer.

episodes.name: Nightmare for a Nightingale
episodes.overview: An opera singer accidentally kills her husband who has suddenly shown up after a 10-year absence, but his body disappears.

episodes.name: Dial a Deadly Number
episodes.overview: When he is a wealthy young woman mistakenly dials his number, an out of work actor pretends to be a psychiatrist and tries to help her understand her recurring dreams of murder.

episodes.name: Kill Two Birds
episodes.overview: Two female tourists become involved with criminals who are chasing a man recently released from prison who knows the whereabouts of stolen money.

episodes.name: A Midsummer Nightmare
episodes.overview: While her husband is away, the wife of a private detective investigates a murder case.

episodes.name: Death in Deep Water
episodes.overview: A witness against a crime syndicate hides on a deserted island, where he meets a beautiful young woman who persuades him to murder her rich older husband.
